description: Retrieves a paginated list of deployments.

parameters.name: historyFilter
parameters.description: The filter for the list of deployments. Choose one of the following options: ALL --- The list includes all deployments. LATEST_ONLY --- The list includes only the latest revision of each deployment. Default: LATEST_ONLY.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to be returned per paginated request. Default: 50

nested_items.name: deployments
nested_items.description: A list that summarizes each deployment.

nested_items.name: targetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the target IoT thing or thing group. When creating a subdeployment, the targetARN can only be a thing group.

nested_items.name: revisionId
nested_items.description: The revision number of the deployment.

nested_items.name: creationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the deployment was created, expressed in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: isLatestForTarget
nested_items.description: Whether or not the deployment is the latest revision for its target.

nested_items.name: parentTargetArn
nested_items.description: The parent deployment's target ARN within a subdeployment.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
